title: The Reformed Vampire Support Group
description: IF BEING A VAMPIRE WERE EASY, THERE WOULDN'T HAVE TO BE A REFORMED VAMPIRE SUPPORT GROUP.Nina became a vampire in 1973, when she was fifteen, and she hasn't aged a day since. But she hasn't had any fun either, because her life is so sickly and boring.It becomes ever worse when one of the vampires in her therapy group is staked by a mysterious slayer. Threatened with extinction, she and her fellow vampires hunt down the culprit - and soon find themselves up against some gun-toting werewolf traffickers who will stop at nothing. Can a bunch of feeble counch potatoes win a fight like this? Is there more to your average vampire than meets the eye?
author: Catherine Jinks
